title: Modernizing the Repository
body:
Lots of work to reduce the amount of work done in the cake files and leave it up to the correct tools.
 - The native libSkiaSharp is now pretty much built using the GN/Ninja tooling
    - all the C/C++ code is in the `skia` external
    - Win32/UWP/Android/Linux are all built _inside_ the external
    - iOS/tvOS/macOS/watchOS still need the XCode projects at this time
 - Signing/Docs/Versioning/Artifacts are all done withing the MSBuild .csproj files (or rather the .targets files)
 - Cleaned up the .cake files to remove any unused functions
 - Correct legal/copyright/licensing values for the assemblies and NuGets
